Room.Name: Khelleva Circle
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along the northern edge of Khelleva Circle.
Room.LongDescription: Eidenhoft Boulevard continues to the north from Khelleva Circle. The Circle itself continues to the southeast and southwest. On the western side of the road, you can see a strange building with a large gem hovering about it. When the sunlight hits the gem, it radiates a vigorous purple hue over the building and its adjacent roads.
